description: This file defines the main frontend application component for a note-taking app using the Lightning.js framework, managing layout, state, and keyboard shortcuts.
published: * (default export is the main App component)

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main Lightning component managing notes, layout, and user interactions.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Handles selection of a note from the NotesList component.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a specified note and updates UI state.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves a note; creates new or updates existing.

methods.name: _createNewNote
methods.description: Creates a new, blank note and updates the UI.

methods.name: _saveCurrentNote
methods.description: Saves the current note being edited.

methods.name: _applyResponsive
methods.description: Adjusts layout based on window size for responsiveness.

methods.name: _syncUI
methods.description: Synchronizes UI elements with the internal state.
